date: Tue Mar 08 2022 04:06:55 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
pageTitle: Dana Blumberg gets engaged to Patriots owner Robert Kraft at a Tommy Hilfiger gala
description: Kraft and Blumberg began dating in 2019 when they were each 78 years old and 45 years old. They were first photographed holding hands at the French Open in June 2019, and then again at the Women's World Cup soccer finals in Paris a month later. On March 6, fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger announced the couple's engagement from the stage of the inaugural amfAR Gala Palm Beach event.
metaDescription: Patriots owner Robert Kraft's engagement to girlfriend Dr. Dana Blumberg was revealed this weekend at a gala honoring Tommy Hilfiger.
generatedText: Dana Blumberg, a former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, said the U.S. should not be "trying
